post.body: Check out the real life Iron Man http://is.gd/e9se Tell ur kids don't try this at home!! U have been warned!!
Had dnr @ Bankers Club. Food is so so, $$ r high, portions r small. Don't know why ppl eat there. Pic taken frm club http://snurl.com/97u5y
Reading this book by Larry Julian, different twist to normal thinking or funning business http://is.gd/dX2F
My hosting company is kinda slow lately. Going 2 b hard to upgrade software on my sites. Maybe it's better to get it done next year.
Upgraded OpenOffice to v3.0 Now I can open MS office files with .xlsx & .docx from MS. Try it. OpenOffice is MS office equivalent & is free
Looking for .docx file converter for OpenOffice. Why can't MS just stick to one file format?
Going to use the next few days till new years day to figure out 2009's goals
Everyone broke the rule of not giving presents on Christmas for the adults. But good gifts r ok. maybe next year will stick to the rule
Rcv claim cheque 4 my client affected in the landslide. The cash will be handy to rebuild lives. Happy it took around 10 days only
Learning new things by downloading podcast thru iTunes. Great stuff free in itunes, not only music. check out mgmt, leadership topics etc
My client looking for 2 accounts clerks, admin assistant & salesperson for medical sales; Section 17 PJ. Pls spread the word. Msg me pls
My first video message. Most impt, I hope to catch all our clients for review in coming months. http://vital-money.com/go/2009
Ps 90:12 Teach us to number our days aright that we may gain a heart of wisdom
what is the best way to track items & docs so that my wife & I know what it done, outstanding, where r files located?
I broke my own promise not 2 read anymore of such blogs. Not gonna change anything. Why waste time? http://snurl.com/83d8y
Going for a jog. It's late but need to get some exercise to get the blood running & flush out the toxins in the system.
Joined seesmic.com where u can post 30sec video & ask question with video reply
Bukit Antarabangsa short update on my blog http://snurl.com/7qdxw
Just got home. Running around to get documents to file insurance claims for a client involved in Bkt Antarabangsa landslide. Tired
Pls pray for strength for my friend with the lost of wife & home & that he will be able to cope with the kids.
